attributes.action: Lowering healthy food costs in order to create a healthier Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am studying the rise in Diabetes and feel that in order to eat healthily to decrease diabetes and obesity, the government should be lowering healthy food costs. I am a student and have to spend little money I have to feed my children but feel these foods are not healthy enough as I have to buy according to my budget. I want to know if anyone else feels the same way but not only that, if the government is willing to reconsider food costs in order to feed the nation better and healthier food.
